overview: Matt serves many roles: husband, father, account supervisor, digital initiative manager, search marketer, MBA student, hunter and student pilot. In his career as an advertising agency account supervisor, he leads the strategic direction and account management for retail-oriented and B2B clients in the QSR, HVAC, Automotive, broadcast TV and oil field services industries. Also, he serves as the leader of his agency’s digital initiative; Matt works with clients to promote their brand with website development, paid/organic search and lead generation. He is a Google Certified Partner and supervises a team of digital and traditional advertising strategists. Matt graduated from the University of Texas at Austin with a B.S. in Advertising and is currently pursuing his Masters of Business administration at Rice University, Jones Graduate School of Business. If youâ€™d like to know more, Google him.
